description: Details of hard and soft landscaping pursuant to condition no. 5 of planning permission ref. P/2007/3165 dated 8/2/08 for removal of greenhouses, barn and portable buildings at west end of site, and erection of part single, two and three-storey two-form entry Primary and Nursery School with associated facilities and hardstandings, including multi-use games area on playing field to north, formation of a pedestrian access and a vehicular access on to Norwood Green Road, alterations and formation of pedestrian and vehicular routes and provision of 57 car parking spaces, including 9 disabled parking spaces, for the proposed school and Norwood Hall, internal and external alterations and installation of wheelchair platform/stairlift access to north elevation, and an external staircase to Norwood Hall in conjunction with its use as an Adult Education and Community Centre
